column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I have been here several times and every time I go I see and learn something new. The museum is huge and if you really want to see everything it has to offer at once
column2: plan on spending the day there (it's very worth it). There are deals for Illinois residents to go for free on certain days
column3: which is awesome! They also have student discounts. Overall it's a beautiful place with so much to see.
